text: inerisu mets’iḥāfuni yemīyanebu sīẖonu āyihudochi፡- kirisitīyanochi beminimi layi āyidelumi ālu፡፡ kirisitīyanochimi፡- āyihudochi beminimi layi āyidelumi ālu፡፡ inidezīhu inezīya yemayawik’uti (āgarīwochi) yenigigirachewini bit’ē ālu፡፡ ālahimi bezīya berisu yileyayubeti beneberuti negeri betiniša’ē k’eni bemekakelachewi yiferidali፡፡
